data.eml:eml: A new species of sponge-dwelling Oukuriella (Chironomidae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fusari, Lívia Maria, Bellodi, Carolina Ferraz, Lamas, Carlos José Einicker (2014): A new species of sponge-dwelling Oukuriella (Chironomidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 3764 (4): 418-426, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3764.4.2
